title: Rainy night city driving with a red car and a bus on the road.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city with a red car and a bus on the road.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.4 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are tall buildings on both sides of the street. The traffic is light, and the traffic lights are green. The ego vehicle is following a red car and is next to a bus on the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the presence of other vehicles on the road. The driver is being cautious and maintaining a safe distance from the red car and the bus. The driver is also paying attention to the traffic lights and following the rules of the road.
